
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/Can-daydayup/p/18712156" title="发布于 2025-02-12 21:20">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">C#/.NET/.NET Core技术前沿周刊 | 第 24 期（2025年1.27-1.31）</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250212211747870-367237450.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器">前言</h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器">C#/.NET/.NET Core技术前沿周刊，你的每周技术指南针！记录、追踪C#/.NET/.NET Core领域、生态的每周最新、最实用、最有价值的技术文章、社区动态、优质项目和学习资源等。让你时刻站在技术前沿，助力技术成长与视野拓宽。</p>
<blockquote data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<p>欢迎投稿、推荐或自荐优质文章、项目、学习资源等。</p>
</blockquote>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<li><strong>🏆技术前沿周刊Gitee开源地址：</strong> <a href="https://gitee.com/ysgdaydayup/DotNetGuide/blob/main/docs/DotNet/DotNetWeekly.md" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://gitee.com/ysgdaydayup/DotNetGuide/blob/main/docs/DotNet/DotNetWeekly.md</a></li>
<li><strong>📰技术前沿周刊GitHub开源地址：</strong> <a href="https://github.com/YSGStudyHards/DotNetGuide/blob/main/docs/DotNet/DotNetWeekly.md" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://github.com/YSGStudyHards/DotNetGuide/blob/main/docs/DotNet/DotNetWeekly.md</a></li>
</ul>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器">一款 .NET 开源、完善、轻量级的医疗影像<span>PACS系统</span></h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<li><strong>文章简介：</strong> DicomSCP是一款开源（MIT License开源协议）、免费、完善、轻量级的医疗影像PACS系统，基于.NET Core 的 DICOM SCP（Service Class Provider）服务器，提供 DICOM 存储、工作列表、查询检索服务，打印服务，WADO/DicomWeb服务，集成了功能强大的DICOM 桌面和Web查看器。</li>
<li><strong>文章地址：</strong> <a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/G8XvIOLJjL-_jecfMQh6VA" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/G8XvIOLJjL-_jecfMQh6VA</a></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250212211807741-1953599945.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250212211812759-1909689529.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250212211819003-1581215514.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器">C# <span>OpenCvSharp 部署3D人脸重建3DDFA-V3</span></h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<li><strong>文章简介：</strong> C# OpenCvSharp 部署3D人脸重建3DDFA-V3。</li>
<li><strong>文章地址：</strong> <a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247509884&amp;idx=2&amp;sn=a5bb46e750ee1f4f0d38c2b7ac737ab1&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/h8dKMN2sCAy-BwO7wK2BvA</a></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250212211833499-1649986233.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器">2025年值得推荐的 8 款 WPF UI 控件库</h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<li><strong>文章简介：</strong> 今天大姚给大家分享 8 款开源、美观、功能强大、简单易用的WPF UI控件库，希望可以帮助到有需要的同学。</li>
<li><strong>文章地址：</strong> <a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/jilDvT1OczvfFkdCoQpUcw" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/jilDvT1OczvfFkdCoQpUcw</a></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250212211844805-1486700826.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250212211849269-101878563.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250212211854876-2010580936.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器">分享2款 .NET 开源且强大的翻译工具</h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<li><strong>文章简介：</strong> 对于程序员而言永远都无法逃避和英文打交道，今天大姚给大家分享2款 .NET 开源、功能强大的翻译工具，希望可以帮助到有需要的同学。</li>
<li><strong>文章地址：</strong> <a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247509898&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=1ff23be3d2b9744dd42dceb48bfd6906&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/DWAGJGvE5QlZCnlAglKV-g</a></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250212211906532-1498350725.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250212211912435-74376400.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器">【译】.NET 升级助手现在支持升级到集中式包管理</h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<li><strong>文章简介：</strong> 【译】.NET 升级助手现在支持升级到集中式包管理。</li>
<li><strong>文章地址：</strong> <a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzAwNTMxMzg1MA==&amp;mid=2654101088&amp;idx=3&amp;sn=478ef086a896019c0bef3f5897ca9b29&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/kTBnZM7wvq-xAsHxx5k0_Q</a></li>
</ul>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器">【译】轻松评估 AI 应用程序的质量</h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<li><strong>文章简介：</strong> 【译】轻松评估 AI 应用程序的质量。</li>
<li><strong>文章地址：</strong> <a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzAwNTMxMzg1MA==&amp;mid=2654101082&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=35d033a9105e6620c3d3ce6a0d9edd36&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/pTNzU0db3qC1qO2A1ZlTpw</a></li>
</ul>
